text:
Singer Lady Gaga and her boyfriend Taylor Kinney braved the weather and took a chilly dip in the icy cold waters at North Avenue Beach here to raise money for the Special Olympics.

They participated in the annual fundraiser event Chicago Polar Plunge on Sunday, reported aceshowbiz.com.

The Born this way hit-maker uploaded some photographs on her Instagram and Twitter accounts.

“We had such a good time! Though I can tell Taylor’s shorts were freezing in this pic,” Gaga wrote alongside a photograph.

The 29-year-old singer also shared an image of herself embraced by Kinney.

This is the second time in a row that the duo has participated in the event. — IANS
title: Lady Gaga plunges into icy water for charity
